level.heading: Failure to give notice.
level.text: If the mutual company complies substantially and in good faith with the notice requirements of this subchapter, the mutual company's failure to give any member or members any required notice does not impair the validity of any action taken under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-159, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-731.
